test.sql: SELECT SUM( CASE WHEN e.EmployeeID % 2 = 0 THEN (SELECT 1 FROM Orders o WHERE o.EmployeeID = e.EmployeeID) ELSE 0 END ) FROM Employees e

expectedError.text: Cannot perform aggregate function on an expression containing a subquery: "SUM"(CASE WHEN "e"."EmployeeID" % 2 = 0 THEN ( SELECT 1 FROM Orders AS o WHERE "o"."EmployeeID" = "e"."EmployeeID") ELSE 0 END).
